com.singularity.ee.agent.systemagent.api
Interface IStreamConsumer

public interface IStreamConsumer

represents a stream consumer consuming lines till it is active. Once you are inactive you stop receiving callbacks from the stream you are reading.If there is only one active consumer, the stream reader delivering the callbacks will in most cases exit.

Method Summary
 void consumeLine(String line)
          callbacks till the stream consumer is active.
 boolean isActive()
          this question is asked before every callback, so you get a chance to be pulled off the list when you are done before every callback.
 

Method Detail

consumeLine

void consumeLine(String line)
callbacks till the stream consumer is active. once it is not active - the stream consumer is removed from the active list.

Parameters:
line - the line read from the stream

isActive

boolean isActive()
this question is asked before every callback, so you get a chance to be pulled off the list when you are done before every callback.

Returns:
if the stream consumer is still active/wants to be active.
